text: mTORC1 contributes to the regulation of necroptosis .
( A ) L929 cells were treated with zVAD.fmk or <extra_id_0> TNFalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> for 9 hr and harvested for western blot .

( B ) Cell under serum free condition were treated with <extra_id_0> bFGF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> or <extra_id_0> bFGF <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / zVAD.fmk for the indicated amounts of time , followed by western blotting using the indicated antibodies .
( C ) Necroptosis was induced by zVAD.fmk or <extra_id_0> TNFalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in L929 cell in the presence of inhibitors of Akt ( Akt inh .
VIII ) and mTOR ( rapamycin , Torin-1 and PI-103 ) .
( D ) L929 cells with mTOR siRNA knockdown were harvested for western blot or treated with zVAD.fmk or <extra_id_0> TNFalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> for 24 hrs .
Cell viability was determined 24 hr after activation of necroptosis .
In all graphs , average+ / - SD was plotted .
